content.detailedDescription: I didn't see it but 2 unidentified objects showed up in my picture.  i'm dieing for someone to look at it.   i took the pic last summer but didn't know what to do about it. i just saw your tv show. no one takes me seriously but no one can explain it away either.  hopefully i sent the right pics.
content.summary: Showed up in my pictures

content.detailedDescription:
En vacance au maroc en ao���t 2010 dans la r���gion de fez je r���alisais des photos de paysages.Puis ��� mon retour ��� mon domicile en france ,j'ai t���l���charg��� ces photos sur mon ordinateur.C'est en positionnant une de celle-ci sur ma page d���accueil que j'ai aper���u l'objet insolite qui se trouvais dessus (voire la photo et un agrandissement partiel joint)l'objet m���tallique semble-t-il (ou les objets) d'environ 25/30 m���tres devait ���tre immobile ou presque car sinon je n'aurait pas manqu��� de l'apercevoir imm���diatement.

content.detailedDescription:
on sunday march 9th 2014 at approx. 1745hrs i went out back and using my iphone5c took a picture of an approaching storm, i then walked from the back yard to the street in front of our house and took two more photos. i then went in to eat dinner and then looked at the photos, it was then that i noticed the green orb in all three of the pictures. after dinner i went out back and took some more photos of the storm to see if it was a problem with my camera. in none of the subsequent photos did the object appear. i never saw this object with my own eyes i just noticed it after i looked at the photos. i posted the pictures on my fb page and had mixed reactions to them. i think it could have been ball lighting since there was thunder in the area.. the one picture shows what looks like a half dome force field or possibly a concussion wave around it. ive seen other strange things since i moved up here but this is the first time i caught something on film. 
 any feedback from you and your group would be very much appreciated.
content.summary: on sunday the 9th of march i took three pictures of an approacing storm along with the sunset. i then went and had dinner and when i looked at the photos i took there was an object in the photos that i cant explain.

content.detailedDescription: Just somebody call cause i have evidence
content.summary: I thought it was some airplanes until i further looked but then as they got got closer we notice that it was something else

content.detailedDescription: Just somebody call cause i have evidence
content.summary: I thought it was some airplanes until i further looked but then as they got got closer we notice that it was something else

content.detailedDescription: This sighting was posted on one of my friends facebook post she works for the rescue squad and the sighting was seen but the police dispatcher and a police officer who followed it and parked by a bridge directly under it. not the first time a ufo has been sighted in mecklenburg. it happened in 1969 and state police was involve. just thought you might want to check it out someone. maybe other witnesses i don't know.Let me know if you happen to find out anything this is cool i know we are not alone!!!!
content.summary: Lights shining like a bright star but slowly miving no sound

content.detailedDescription: All of this started at about 7:00 pm to after 10:00 pm. 3/12/14 on border of co and wy, at chalkbluffs. stargazing with wife. first noticed bright light on southern horizon that split into two lights. for over three hours we watched lights of varying intensity come into the area from the southeast to the south. none of them landed. some seemed like they were combining. at one point there were five in a row, then three of them repositioned into a triangle shape. some would grow very bright, then dim out or fade away entirely. when aircraft would come into the area, they would all fade out. after aircraft left, they would turn back on. hard to say how many me and my wife saw. if each time would one appear it was new craft, then we saw dozens. i am certain many of them were the same craft however. i feel as though we probably saw a dozen different ones, however the most that were visible at once were five, but it looked as though a sixth very dim one was there as well. was able to see them through both a telescope, and binoculars. most of them were bright orb shapes, one appeared to be a diamond. even as we left for the evening, one was still on the horizon cycling between dim and intense. more intense then anything else in the sky except the moon. they did not have aircraft lights, and they did not blink. at multiple times during this, we could hear a very strange pulse or thump. it was off and on and was varying in loudness. hard to tell where it was coming from. not sure if it came from the objects because they were a few miles away at least. i would like also to state that i was able to keep one right in my telescope for maybe around five minutes. anyone who has ever used a telescope can agree that when looking at a star or planet, you have to track it slowly due to the rotation of the earth.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Over three hours of bright lights that would dim out or fly off entirely. one hovered for over 10 minutes before leaving.

content.detailedDescription: Orange glowing orb, like a star, but not clear like a stars in the background of this light. it was orb shaped and orange with a solid dark orange nucleus. it was really pretty! it made absolutely no sounds and hovered for several minutes till the clouds came in and it vanished. i thought it could be a flare, but flares are red or white and fall the ground and are seen through thin clouds. i know it was not a star, i know the star chart very well and this was something new to me. i am not saying this is intelligent, that is something else, but this would be classified in the aviation world as a ufo. i called my son, in spokane washington, to see if he saw anything in the sky that resembled this and he said, "no!"
content.summary: Bright glowing orange orb with a dark orange nucleus floating in the night sky,

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on a bench in owl's head park in brooklyn, an excellent vantage point overlooking new york bay with a view of new jersey. airplanes leaving and arriving at newark airport could be seen as dark gray objects in the sky. no one else was around as it was quite cold, maybe 30 degrees.

i looked up at the sky above new jersey and saw something totally unique. i had no idea what it was or where it came from. the sky was a clear dark blue and the three lights i saw were parallel streaks of white, as if someone had drawn with a piece of white chalk on the dark blue sky. that was just the beginning. these thin white lines thickened and became luminous, brightening to the point where i could not look straight at them for very long. it was an unbelievable transformation! they were pulsating and emitting a silvery light, while the airplanes below were dark and difficult to see.

after a while, they returned to the think white streaks i had seen originally and i aimed my cell phone camera in their direction but there was nothing to be seen in the window on my phone. the lights then changed into circles of white light, though not as bright as the thickened white lines. these circles, or orbs, were kind of star-like, moving slowly in the sky independent of one another. as the sun was going down, their color changed from white to pink and then orange. 

during the event while i was sitting on the bench, a man passed by walking his dog. i asked him if he saw anything special in the evening sky and when he looked up he became very excited. he said, "yes, i see those lights. and i see some of them pulsating. they must be ufo's." i had put on my long range glasses to make sure of what i was seeing. there was no doubt in my mind this was like nothing i had ever seen or even heard about. i am 66 years of age and work as an accountant. by nature, i am very observant. when the circular lights moved farther away and finally our of sight, i was thinking this was caused by the influence of something other-worldly.
content.summary: Streaks of light (4-5), then thicken and pulsating, changing to round shaped objects all moving independently.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were talking in his driveway when we both seen a bright flash of white light in the sky. it was like a flash bulb going off. it was a very high flash about the size of a penny held at arms length. after the flash a light what looked like a bright star was visible. the light started moving to the south slowly and then moved a little faster. it moved about the distance of 2-3 inches at arms length in 4-5 seconds. the light then looked like it jumped to warp speed and was gone. the total time of the event was around 10 seconds. we herd no sound. me and my friend both said did you see that! we both had seen the same thing. i have no clue what we had seen.
content.summary: Bright flash of white light. star like white dot of light moved slowly then faster till it moved very fast and was gone.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to have a cigarette and as i always do i observe the air traffic of ft. lauderdale exec., ft. lauderdale/hollywood intl. and further to the south miami intl. i immediately noticed three separate aircraft, one travelling west, one headed east, and the third one moving northwest. the fourth object was stationary and blue/green in color. my first thought was is that is a blimp. but was immediately confused when the object/orb of light rose quickly and changed from blue/green to magenta/redish in color. i kept telling myself its not real its only something other people see, or something you see in a movie. i kept observing for a couple of more mins, and then ran inside to tell my wife and children to come see this strange light in the sky. they all came outside to see what i was seeing. they all were calm and were trying to give it a rational explanation. but i can tell you as a lifelong observer of aircraft this is not something i have ever witnessed before.Being a professional photographer i ran to get my camera and tripod, set up and began to make a few frames. attached is just a few out of the total of 33 i took before the object/orb decended behind a building.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orb of light seen in southwest sky in coral springs florida.

content.detailedDescription: The first time i was driving to work. i thought it was a streetlight but it was much too high. i know my neighborhood well enough to know that it was no streetlight or airplane.  the first time i saw it blinked in an out.  the second time i saw it it split into two sections and then it was gone.  the last time i saw it it just vanished.
content.summary: Just an ominious light in the sky.  it seems to follow me.

content.detailedDescription: Very bright white and red lights x 2 in a westerly direction from my home. diappeared then reappeared then vanished. almost looked like a very bright flare. however it is just open desert all the way to california and no military installations in that direction.
content.summary: Very bright white and red lights in a westerly direction from my home. diappeared then reappeared then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to side of house to trash cans and noticed it on way back into the house. i noticed it out of corner of my eye. i went and stood against railing of larger part of deck. it stayed there for a while then i went inside for my camera and when came out it had moved across the alley behind a tree. the lights are bright and fade at times, can change lights, and lights went completely out at one point *which is when i went for my camera, object seemed to disappear then lights slowly came back on. i am perplexed, wondering what i am seeing, what it is. i am still seeing it, but it has never been so close as the first time back in october 2013.
content.summary: 2 tapered lights in front that were wide side by side on rear round bubble lights small round individual lights five or six.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i we're at the park flying rc planes and i noticed somthing strange out of the corner of my eye as i was flying my rc plane so i said to my girlfriend what is that and she noticed it too it was flying slowly and silently south east over us. i couldnt focus on it since i was controlling the rc airplane but she said it looked like a floating dark cloud with some type of appendage on the top of it sticking out. "very strange"
content.summary: Girlfriend and i noticed a massive cloud like ufo very high in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was attending my grandsons ball game.I occasionally would look up to the sky to see if i can find a ufo. i was watching a contrail being made in a n/s direction, but i could not see the plane. making it. all of a sudden the forward progress of the contrail just stopped. i looked ahead of it to see if the airplane was visible, it wasnt. so i slowly scanned the sky turning back to where i first observed the contrail, i then observed something very shiney flying n/s, it's flight path would be about 200 yds due west of where the contrail was observed.
 this objects flight path would bring it directly overhead. it was the shape of a cigar, bright and shiney. the sun was going down and the object was catching direct light. the interesting thing about this object is that at first i thought it was an airplane, but there wasnt any wings. i asked my wife to take a look and she confirmed it did not have any wings and that she didnt know what it was. i followed the flight path of it going in a southerly direction until i could not see it any more. i was sort of dumb founded. i thought to myself, did i just see a ufo ?  i have waited a long time for this possibility. i am a mufon ssd/fi who looks up every chance i get.
content.summary: Silver object flying approx 200-300 mph, had no wings

content.detailedDescription: 01 ...Ufo two balls of light . 2014feb 18 grey alien carrying a rod with writings on it . it peeked over a small ditch it hid it's eyes from  the night vision camera it opened it's eyes it had huge eyes a flat head it was looking south then scanned the hills in the back in a arch then i thought it went insane or crazy it looked up to the sky and started scanning the sky in a arch back and forth really fast i can see eyes within in it's eyes like it's eyes we're hidden behind big lenses then a feeling of extreme hopelessness came into my head it had feelings with it after it left i had a bad feeling like i went to a funeral
content.summary: Six round windows spikes sticking in front

content.detailedDescription: Was outside on my patio taking pictures of the beginning of sunset when i noticed the craft to the top left away from sun, i did not see it move but immediately turned my camera to it to get pictures, after a bit over a minute it simply vanished or recloaked itself. it was round with a dome type feature on it, grayish tone in color. am getting used to seeing different "visitors" the past three years here lol
content.summary: Was to the top left of the sun beginning to set

content.detailedDescription:
As i was coming home from a night class at the univ. of rhode island, early april, 2008, about 9pm, up ahead at the intersection of ministerial road (rt. 110) and old post rd, in the perryville section of south kingstown, ri, i saw a large (maybe 15 ft. across), round, off-white light hovering above a telephone pole (power transformer attached to pole).  my immediate thought was 'that's not suppose to be there.'  i slowed down as i approached the intersection from the nw (post rd north) and stopped at the four-way stop sign, keeping my eyes on the light. there were no other cars on the road at that time; night was clear with stars and cool.  i was fixated on the light as i crossed the intersection and stopped my car below the large light, trying to make out the shape of the craft, which i thought was either triangle or chevron shaped. i was a dense, dark object with only the lights prominent.  there was no noise whatsoever as the craft just floated perfectly still above the pole. i then noticed a small 'electric green' flashing light, like a neon light, and a beautiful green color,  at what i would call the rear of the craft. i estimated that the craft was about 30 ft. to 50 ft. in length. there were two homes on either side of the road where i stopped (noticed no one inside) and an automotive garage (scott's automotive) which is usually open nights 'till 11pm,next to the house across from the pole. i got out of my car, keeping my door open in case i needed to beat a hasty retreat for any reason, while i observed in fascination this craft.  at that moment a car came out from a small dirt road/driveway next to scott's automotive and i thought it would stop...Instead, it accelerated past me and blew through the stop sign heading north on old post rd...The driver must have seen the craft i was looking at and in fear sped away.  i was alone again at that point, and as i watched the craft in slowly and ever-so smoothly pivoted, rose up a bit, and slowly drifted off across ministerial rd, heading nw, over a hill and toward the town of wakefield.  at that point i had this strange sensation that time was slowing down, even as i got back in my car to head home nearby.  i called the south kingstown police to report this incident as i drove.  the female dispatcher took my call seriously and said no other calls had come in related to it at that point.
as i drove away from the spot the feeling of slow time seemed to go away.
i was too fascinated to be scared of what i saw but never felt threatened by the craft at all...Just felt lucky to have such a fascinating observation.
content.summary: Dark chevron shaped ufo with large, round light underneath hovers over power transformer

content.detailedDescription:
I've never told anyone about this until today, a 25 plus year friend we just started talking about ufo' s i got brave and told her this, i use to remember the year and what city and i know i knew this, but pieces have faded almost like plucked out of my memory, i don't have a clue where i was i do know it was between 2002 and 2010 it feels most possible when i lived  in nv. jan 2004 i move there and moved away in jan 2010. i use to remember more detail stuff but it's like it was wiped out of my memory, so sometimes i think i was dreaming, but i'm pretty darn sure i wasn't. no memory of waking up after siting i was just there where ever i lived my apt. so all i remember now is many many humans outside just outside, on the side walks in the streets, on the grass. hearing like a low buzzy humming sound not loud at all, many colors of lights white red blue yellow bright lights, and this i feel was mother ship because i remember it was massive huge, i'd say easily 10 football fields or more, and a voice speaking  like there were speakers u could hear e voice well, i have know idea what was said, not any more i use to, plucked out of my memory. i just remember not good, that's only way i can explain it, bad things said to all people on ground, this ship was like right there over our heads, i'd say no more then a couple hundred yards above and i remember maybe a mile  or so straight ahead were many no actual amount i remember of small ufo's triangle shape disc shape darker color possible grayish white or bright lights just in front as they were flying towards use don't remember seeing this smaller ones close up, i don't remember any more of ship leaving plucked out of memory, it's creepy because i know i use to know a lot more of this siting and it's vanished from my memory, extremely real feelings not a dream feeling, i knew what it was everyone did  i remember feeling scared to death, i wish i could remember the bad, not good feelings of what the voice said and what is so bad in what we heard. i've reckelected  this thing siting i guess i would call it, 5 or 6 times, last time before today was less then a week but was blank as i am right now, so i just forgot about it. when i was living in nv. my hair started thinning a lot almost like small bald patches right on top up front on my head, since i moved back to ca. in 2010 it's not thin anymore. i also use to get these little small almost like paper cuts on my fingers all the time, they be sore red and sometimes i would squeeze and clear liquid would come out, i put hydrogen peroxide on all the time so i wouldn't get infected, and just like my memory so faded about siting same goes for a so familiar feeling that i woke up all twisted up in bed at least once since then, i am not a mover when i sleep, i always wake up the same way as i feel asleep. this is hard to write about i can't explain it creepy feeling knowing memories then what i just knew what i was thinking then it's washed away no reckalishion of many things from that siting, that i know i use to know, i'm thinking maybe no more then 2 years ago that i remembered everything, it was within a year of moving back to ca. that i had good reckalision of that siting. july 2013 i bought a new mini apple ipad never any real issues, no viruses apples don't get viruses  anyway but since about 1030 am this morning, 3-12-14 after i told my friend and we went online to see some ufo info spots, this ipad is acting weird, i was filling out your questioner i tap the boxes and it wouldn't check mark the yes and no boxes very easily, and typing this letter the letters and spacing bar keeps hesitating as well as back spacing. also i have some esp i believe we all kind of do, it use to be quite often, i new for a fact i was going to win a prize at my kids school function  and i made it loud and clear many people heard me  say i was going to win. i also had a preminission   i was awake and later that day i saw this happened on news in my head a child in a school bus who got killed bad accident ,  now i 
hardely ever have esp or preminissions they diminished within the last 5 to 8 yrs. i am curious if any other persons have had sort of the same forgetful bad feeling siting? i don't remember being abducted i don't feel like any objects are under skin, i did have a lot of pelvic inflammatory infections when i was in my mid to late 20, but my husband was a cheater.   i was leary about writing this due to poor memory of all, but very curious to see if any one else ever experienced something similar. i'm curious also to see if my ipad stops hesitating when i log out of yr site, i do believe in ufo 's no one can be that ignorant to think in the massive university there isn't some other sort of life, and with ancient egypt and drawings it shows the technology was so far anvanced of these ufo's so many yrs ago, they must really be more advanced  now. anyway i hope you don't think i'm a crack pop, i hope to hear of some similar sites as i have.  i believe i had another  siting very quick in february to april was month 2010 i just moved back to ca. at my moms trailer in highland ca. on baseline st. it was 10 or 11 pm ish super clear night  i was smoking cigarette out side looking way up in sky saw light. from quit a distance and very high but i never saw anything move across the skies that fast before i knew it it was directly straight above me but still quite a distance, then this light was gone completely i kept watching never saw again, no clouds nothing just like it went right into a hole in the sky, no trails no speeding up descending, just gone that quick. well thank you for your time. robbin
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: More then 25. lots human all outside hearing voice look up massive ufo hover, remember was bad not good what was happening

content.detailedDescription: I was at the park with my daughter. i had her in a swing when i got a phone call from my cousin. he was frantic and told me to hurry up and go outside. i advised him that i was already outside. he told me to look up north east towards the moon. he stated that there was at least 40 objects in the sky. i took my daughter out of the swing and proceeded out from under the tree. i stayed on the phone with him, and to my amazement i spotted one object nw of the position of the moon. as i looked more to the left of the moon i saw a group of them. there was at least 30 of them. mind you this is not my first encounter. i have been interested in the ufo phenom for some time now. its very exciting. that being said, when i first saw the group of them it gave me a sort of feeling of anxiety. i have had sightings in the past, but the amount of objects in the sky at the time was almost overwhelming. as i watched in amazement, the objects worked together to form what looked like a peace sign, a square, and a circle. i noticed that no one found it strange that i had a child in my hand talking frantically and pointing at the sky. so i walked over to a family having a bbq and asked them if they wanted to see something cool. i never said what i was pointing to. i allowed them to see it on their own. at first they thought it was balloons, but they also witnessed the weird formations. i was about two blocks from where my cousin who called me was. so i hopped in my car and drove over to the house. there was my 2 uncles, about 3 neighbors, and my elderly grandmother. we have these ufo conversations all the time so everyone was extremely excited. when i got there the amount of objects probably reduced to about 10. but that was not even close to the end. we stayed out there for about 2-3 hours. it seemed as though all we had to do was scan the sky and we could spot one. there was one in particular that came closer than all the others. his size was double what the others were. i'm guessing because of the close proximity. it seemed as though he knew we could see him, and was saying hello. that could be complete b/s but that is how it made me feel. and thennnnnn!!!!!! lol like out of some sci-fy movie, leaves fell from the sky, in all directions. no wind, and the leaves were coming from at least 100 feet above the tree lines. and it was all directions. we all looked at each other like what the heck is going on !!!! and then i looked up and saw about three birds acting kind of strange, as i pointed them out i looked to the right of them and noticed about 30-40 birds, flying in a circle, at about 1000 feet or more, in a frenzy like manner. then they started to leave the circle. 2 at a time in a synchronized manner. we sat in the driveway indian style for about another hour after the bird event. these objects were everywhere in all directions, coming and going, hovering, doing circles repetitively. the last one we spotted went over our head and back in the direction where it all started nw of the position of the moon. and that was that. truly and amazing experience. im not sitting here saying there were aliens controlling them. i dont know what they were! i saw what i saw. i don't care if anyone believes what i am saying. i don't even talk to most people about this subject because it is outside of most people's comfort zone. all i can say is look up every once in a while.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Mass sighting, orbs, and birdlike creatures

content.detailedDescription: Me and my daughter was driving north east on mann rd. in indianapolis. we observed about 23 cars pulled over the side of the road. i thought it must be a beautiful sunset this evening,the last vehicle however people were pointing up and i saw a flash from a camera. so we got around the corner where i could  get a look at the sunset, and there it was. i immeaditally pulled the car in the only space left in a drive way,and  immeaditally  me and my daughter got out and we watched this beautiful gleaming spaceship  just up in the sky. there was other  things flying that day as we are not far from the airport. i immeaditally felt a vibration  start in the top of my torso and i felt a shiver work it's way down all the way to my feet. my daughter watched it i told her to get her i pad out and record. she did and it should be on this  thing. my daughter got scared and wanted to go where the other people were but i said i didn't want to take my eye off it. right then i turned toward my car door, looked back and it was gone. i think about this all the time! i felt as if who ever was piloting this huge shiney craft could read all of our minds at the same time. i'm almost positive. anyways after it was gone we stayed there i had to collect my thoughts as to what we had just witnessed. right then about one or two  moments, there were about 5 or 6 jets all heading in from different directions toward where the u.F.O. was at. it was the most shiney thing you could ever imagine. this is no joke! it seems like it wanted us to see it. i immeaditally understood why people don't talk about this kind of thing. there's nothing or no one on this planet that can do anything about it if we had too. i would like to talk with someone that had a experience like the one me and my daughter saw.
content.summary: Unmistakeable shining disk huge in size. me and my daughter watched this thing for about16 min. so shiney gone in a flash! unreal!

content.detailedDescription:
parking car when saw acorn shape shoot out of a cloud over the 22nd street marina at sun rise
hovered for 5 mins and shot off toward long beach into a cloud came out cabrillo beach flew toward long beach turned right toward catalina and was gone
noticed black orb over house flying south towards catalina in a straight line

thought at first it was a remote control air plane but no noise
im a little nervous
content.summary: Saw acorn flying over san pedro

content.detailedDescription:
I work as an airline pilot for an airline in europe. in october 2013 i was operating crew member on the flight from germany to skopje (macedonia). when we flew over slovenia i decided to take some photos of the triglav mountain and the triglav national park. 

only weeks later when i was looking at the photos i noticed several glowing orbs on 3 photos that were taken successively, one after the other. 

i never noticed the objects with my own eyes, however it is also true i never looked in that direction.
content.summary: Glowing orbs observed on the photos taken from the airplane

content.detailedDescription: I observed this incident on new years eve on 12-31-2013 at around 2340-2345 hrs. i was in my car traveling south on s.R.1001s in natrona heights pa. and saw three large ball shaped objects in the sky hovering three in a row over a residential section of town and lined up side by side a few hundred feet apart. i was unable to make out what exactly they were but they definitely had my attention. i would guess they were 400-500 feet in the air. i then turned left on to jefferson ave and stopped my vehicle. i then shined a spot light on one of them but they were to high up to make out what they were. they then briefly formed a triangle formation for a short period of time and after that formed into one large reddish orange ball and left the area flying east. i could hear other people in the area outside talking, presumably to celebrate the new year asking "what is that?".
content.summary: Three large round reddish orange objects

content.detailedDescription: Look call me about this event, to long to write. involved to many people.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: The night wafb was attacked

content.detailedDescription: Driving north on i5, had just passed cook rd exit, observed huge light hovering aboveat rock quarry off kelleher rd. it was a very bright white light like l.E.D. huge, big as a full moon appears when its fulll at like 10-15 degrees above horizon.  biggest and brightest thing ive ever seen in sky, have had 4 other sightings 2 with witnesses but this was much bigger. as i looked at it i tried to rationalize what i was seeing, maybe a helicopter with a new super bright searchlight of some kind? but no movement or flashing lights.. only saw it for about 30-45 sec.B4 i was going up bowhill and the object was out of sight. turned off at the next exit (bow hill) and drove south down hwy 99 till i got back to the flats so i could get another look at it. as i drove past where kelleher and 99 meet i noticed 2 parked police suvs door to door with no lights on and no one around outside of them . drove south on 99 bout another half mile to a bridge over the rail road tracks turned around and didnt see the object or anything in the area anymore, when i passed by kelleher rd again 2 police suv's were still there and with my headlights shinning on them this time i could see no one was in the vehicles. thought that was strange considering what i had seen and the proximity of the vehicles to the sighting location.
content.summary: Huge ball of light hovering over quarry lake observed from i5

content.detailedDescription:
I am a professional photographer living in a rural area - of beaumont california   the 1st time was dec 1, 2013 a small craft came to the end of my drivway-and 3 small figures very faint can be seen.. the next time 12-18-13 a craft came above my house a orb came out of it -the orb approached i was video taping it with my phone - as the orb got closer the screen got blurred with blue staic and the phone shut off. i turned it back on and got pictures .Again it happened several times in january with a burst of ufos coming in around jan 7th through 10th  these ones looked different and have a horrible energy. they started harrasing me and my dogs. one night i came home and the dog.Were terrified shaking like they had been scared to death. it was very late and there was no where to so i parked in a grocery parking lot to wait for dawn. at 4;30 am two lights orbs approached and i put my camera phone and and reversed the frame so i could take pictures of what was in the back window. one very large nasty evil thing appeared in the back window of the truck with a little bug like thing about next to it. the pictures are taken in my truck and my dog islooking at the little bug thing out the rear window- the bug thing is hovering on my tool box in the bed of the truck.It then shot a beam dog. 
 on march 10 at a friends house in san gabriel  we both saw a craft steadly flash and hover. i was hit with a burst of energy from looking at it that knocked me off my feet and made ill.
content.summary: Two in dec- a flood of them in january and since 2014

content.detailedDescription:
I was lying in bed around 10pm when i saw the star like object hovering above tree line south of my house. it would have these white lights that would shoot out of it really fast. it was not constant but did it off and on for around 30 min. my fianc��� called to say she was on her way over to my house when i told her she was missing one hell of a light show. she came over and looked at the object from my bedroom (french doors) facing the south, and said it looked like a bright star. it stopped shooting things (these bright lights out of it really fast) after she got there. after around 30 minutes she saw it shoot 2 of these fast lights or objects from it. she layed there watching it to see if it was going to fly away or disappear for approx an hour and a half and then she fell asleep. it wasn't there the next morning. we don't know what these white lights or objects are that it was emitting but they were shooting out of the star like object super fast. you couldn't see any type of shape. the object was hovering near a barn that had a security light, water, electric and a pond that was north between the object and my house. it was larger than the security light and above the trees. it just look like a super bright star and larger than a normal light on a security pole.
the streaks of light we have captured on the game cameras are going super fast and we have wondered if the streaks of light that this ufo was omitting is related to what we catch on the game cameras on a regular basis.

we have also been ask to report the orb we witnessed in oct. my fianc��� had purchased a new pickup that had a lot of new gadgets on it and that night we were parked in front of my house and were trying to figure out what all the pickups options were and how they worked. i punched the bed light to show her how it worked and how well it lit up the pickup bed then i punched the pickup bed camera to show her how it worked when we both saw this floating round object kind of bouncing around in the bed of the pickup. it was light and round and i'd guess it to be smaller in size than a soccer ball. it bounced around then went up and out of the pickup bed and was gone from sight. we both were stunned and shocked at this. if i need to report this on a separate report i can.

i also think you wanted me to report the time i was working in my shop and i saw a flash of light outside my shop window. i didn't think it was supposed to storm and thought it was a lighting flash so i stuck my head out the door near the winnow to look and see if there was a storm coming up and two steaks of light zoomed by me. they were going to fast i couldn't make out any form or shape to them. they were again, white streaks of light going extremely fast.

thanks and maybe someday we will know what it going on and what these things are.  we don't have a picture of these or the ufo (star like appearance ) that was emitting fast streaks of light. i have a lot of pictures of other very weird streaks of light my game camera has caught as well as many fog like things. i'll attach more pic's of things that were on last weeks sd card (in game camera) that i have mounted on my front porch.
the unknown objects in the sky you have to enlarge a lot to see. the one that shows something in the trees i noticed by looking through several pictures and noticed something different when flipping through the pics fast. it is a darker spot between some tree limbs. i'll send the two pics again so you can look at one then the next and maybe you can see what i'm talking about.
content.summary: Star like appearance but shooting lights out from it

content.detailedDescription: Husband and i were sitting on back porch overlooking the sea of cortez in baja ca and noticed 3 bright looking stars in triangle formation over the water. at the same time we both commented that we hadn't noticed any constellations like that the past nights. as soon as we commented on that the 3 bright looking stars slowly faded out over a few seconds and were gone. they did not re appear and we realized that they were not stars.
content.summary: Witnessed 3 bright looking stars in stationary triangle formation over ocean. as soon as we noticed that they were not stars all three of the lights slowly faded out over around 5 seconds and were gone.
content.locationName: San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
